panels.settings.buttons.filters.name: Name
Send the new message to use for the new addons
Send the new message to use for the updated addons

NOTE: You must reply to this message otherwise you will get ignored
Avaible Variables:
{{name}}: Name of the mod. {{author}}: Name of the creator of the mod. {{authorUrl}}: URL to the mod's creator's profile. {{version}}: Latest mod version in the versions list. {{versions}}: List of the mod's supported versions. {{modloaders}}: List of the mod's supported modloaders. {{categories}}: List of the mod's categories. {{description}}: Description of the mod. {{created}}: Creation date of the mod. {{modified}}: Modification date of the mod. {{color}}: Color of the mod. {{follows}}: Amount of people who follow the mod. {{downloads}}: Amount of the mod's downloads. {{icon}}: Icon of the mod. {{license}}: The license of the mod. {{clientSide}}: Whether the mod is required on the client. {{serverSide}}: Whether the mod is required on the server. {{slug}}: The ID of the mod on modrinth. {{platform}}: List of the platforms where the mod is avaible (currently only Modrinth).
Conditional Variables:
{{?variable:true|false?}} example: {{?name:The name is {{name}}|Missing name?}} Sends "The name is (nome)" if the "name" variable exists, otherwise sends "Missing name". {{?author:The author is {{author}}|?}} Sends "The author is (nome)" if the "name" variable exists, otherwise doesn't send anything.

NOTE: You must reply to this message otherwise you will get ignored
Avaible Variables:
{{oldName}}: Old name of the mod. {{newName}}: New name of the mod. {{oldAuthor}}: Old name of the creator of the mod. {{newAuthor}}: New name of the creator of the mod. {{oldAuthorUrl}}: Old URL to the mod's creator's profile. {{newAuthorUrl}}: New URL to the mod's creator's profile. {{oldVersion}}: Old latest mod version in the versions list. {{newVersion}}: New latest mod version in the versions list. {{oldVersions}}: Old list of the mod's supported versions. {{newVersions}}: New list of the mod's supported versions. {{addedVersions}}: List of the added versions to the mod's supported versions. {{removedVersions}}: List of the removed versions from the mod's supported versions. {{oldModloaders}}: Old list of the mod's supported modloaders. {{newModloaders}}: New list of the mod's supported modloaders. {{addedModloaders}}: List of the added modloaders to the mod's supported modloaders. {{removedModloaders}}: List of the removed modloaders from the mod's supported modloaders. {{oldCategories}}: Old list of the mod's categories. {{newCategories}}: New list of the mod's categories. {{addedCategories}}: List of the added categories to the mod's categories. {{removedCategories}}: List of the removed categories from mod's categories. {{oldDescription}}: Old description of the mod. {{newDescription}}: new description of the mod. {{oldModified}}: Old modification date of the mod. {{newModified}}: New modification date of the mod. {{oldColor}}: Old color of the mod. {{newColor}}: New color of the mod. {{oldFollows}}: Old amount of people who follow the mod. {{newFollows}}: New amount of people who follow the mod. {{oldDownloads}}: Old amount of the mod's downloads. {{newDownloads}}: New amount of the mod's downloads. {{oldIcon}}: Old icon of the mod. {{newIcon}}: New icon of the mod. {{oldLicense}}: The old license of the mod. {{newLicense}}: The new license of the mod. {{oldClientSide}}: Whether the mod was required on the client. {{newClientSide}}: Whether the mod is now required on the client. {{oldServerSide}}: Whether the mod was required on the server. {{newServerSide}}: Whether the mod is now required on the server. {{oldSlug}}: The old ID of the mod on modrinth. {{newSlug}}: The new ID of the mod on modrinth. {{oldPlatform}}: Old list of the platforms where the mod is avaible (currently only Modrinth). {{newPlatform}}: New list of the platforms where the mod is avaible (currently only Modrinth). {{addedPlatform}}: List of the added platoforms where the mod is avaible (currently only Modrinth). {{removedPlatform}}: List of the removed platoforms where the mod is avaible (currently only Modrinth).
Conditional Variables:
{{?variable:true|false?}} example: {{?name:The name is {{name}}|Missing name?}} Sends "The name is (nome)" if the "name" variable exists, otherwise sends "Missing name". {{?author:The author is {{author}}|?}} Sends "The author is (nome)" if the "name" variable exists, otherwise doesn't send anything.

commands.setchannel.messages.success: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.notConfigured: This chat has not been configured for the addons notifications
commands.settings.messages.success: Settings for the Create addons notifications
commands.start.messages.success:
Welcome! This bot will allow you to receive notification when an addon for the Minecraft mod "Create" gets updated or created.
My commands are:

- /setchannel - Se the channel where to send addon notifications.
- /settings - Manage the settings of the bot.

Made by @Stef_DP and published on GitHub.
commands.preview.messages.notConfigured: This chat has been configured for the addons notifications
commands.preview.messages.invalidArgs: You must specify a message between "new" (new addon) or "update" (updated addon)
